PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities can be identified as follows:

1. "Property Value" of the new polymer: This refers to the value of the properties of the new polymer, which are being optimized in the design process.
2. "Property Value" of the requirements: This refers to the values of the requirements that the new polymer must fulfill, such as being able to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Property Value of the new polymer
2. Property Value of the requirements
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. Property Value of the new polymer: This refers to the value of the material properties of the new polymer, which are being optimized in the design process.

Therefore, the only relevant "Property Value" entity in the paragraph is:

1. Property Value of the new polymer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Property Value of the new polymer |
